name: nus-mods
title: NUS Mods
description: Query NUS course right at your fingertip
author: wxiaoyun

commands.name: query-nusmods
commands.title: Query NUSMods
commands.subtitle: Search NUS course information
commands.description: Obtains course information from the NUSMods API and showcases details

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
